name: The Tiny Detective
description:
A submission to B&W Game Jam 2021.

Play as the Tiny Detective, a small but robust investigator who loves detecting. When approached by a potential client about a missing duck, you wonder if this is the right line of work for you. Can you quack the case, or will you fall victim to fowl play too?

Featuring 9 bespoke environments and a one-size-fits-all click-to-interact system, this little game is sure to make you fed up of the sheer number of duck puns and hyphens involved.

Programmer - squizout
Artist - squizout

Fonts:
- Reenie Beanie by James Grieshaber (james@typeco.com)
- NanumPen by NHN Corporation (http://www.nhncorp.com)
- Kenney Mini by Kenney (kenney.nl)

Audio: 
Jazz Brunch by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
